introduction:
The National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation (日本科学未来^ Nippon Kagaku Mirai-kan), simply known as the Miraikan (未来^, literally "Future Museum"), is a museum created by Japan's Science and Technology Agency.
It was opened in 2001. It is situated in a new purpose-built building in the Odaiba District of Tokyo. It can be reached by the Yurikamome driverless fully automated transit system from downtown Tokyo in about 15 minutes.

okyo Trick Art Museum located in Odaiba, Tokyo, is committed to enjoy the 3D artworks and the optical illusion.
